text: Stone Muzalimoja Mambo (born 25 March 1999) is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as midfielder for Troyes. ==Professional career== Born in Kinshasa, DR Congo, Mambo joined the Troyes AC youth academy in 2013, and signed his first professional contract on 24 June 2019. He made his professional debut with Troyes in a 2–1 Coupe de la Ligue loss to RC Lens on 13 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kinshasa Category:Association football midfielders Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers Category:Troyes AC players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Stone Mambo
